data.title: READ Books by Genre
data.text:
Need help choosing a book?

This page lists a sample of titles by genre or theme. These lists do not include all of the books in the READ collection. Search LibCat for more titles.

On this page:

Adventure

The Emerald Mile by Kevin Fedarko

Publication Date: 2013
